data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rédei, Dávid, Tsai, Jing-Fu, Jindra, Zdeněk (2018): The genus Alphocoris in the Indomalaya (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Scutelleridae). Zootaxa 4382 (2): 299-320, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4382.2.5|1 occurrence
